name: @sassy-js/utils
description: JavaScript just got some sass. Sassy.js is a set of sassy tools, utilities, methods, and many more! Sassy.js makes it easy to write cleaner, more readable code with fewer bugs and less boilerplate.

scripts.commit: git add . && git commit -m "build: release prepared"
scripts.release:migrate: cp package.json LICENSE README.md CONTRIBUTING.md dist
scripts.release:version: npx changeset version && npm run release:migrate
scripts.release:prepare: npm run build && npm run release:version
scripts.release: npm run release:prepare && cd dist && npm publish --access=public
